meanings.definition: A substance that is added to a liquid to make it thicker.
meanings.sent1: The chef used thickeners to make the soup thicker.
meanings.sent2: She added thickeners to the sauce to give it a richer texture.
meanings.sent3: The thickeners in the gravy worked their magic, turning it into a velvety delight.
meanings.sent4: The thickeners acted like a superhero, transforming the watery mixture into a creamy masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: With a touch of thickeners, the once thin liquid became a hearty stew.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that thickens.
meanings.sent1: The diligent cook was the main thickeners in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The storm clouds were the natural thickeners of the sky.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous toddler became the unexpected thickeners in the plot.
meanings.sent4: Time was the silent thickeners of their bond, making it stronger with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious potion acted as the magical thickeners in the story, bringing everything together.
